attributes.action: Change the name of Kensington Palace Gardens to honour Ukraine
attributes.background: Due to the diabolical Russian invasion of Ukraine by Russia the UK should follow other capital cities by ensuring the Russian embassy is given an address that honours the people of Ukraine

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local road names are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.
